Installation
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Make sure your compiler is closed when executing the installation program.

Follow the step by step instructions of the 'Installation' section in the Help file.

Compatibility issues with version 3.x
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Custom transitions won't compile.
- Delphi 3, Delphi 4, C++ Builder 3 and C++ Builder 4 are no longer supported.

Changes in this version
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Read the 'What's new' section in the Help file.

Please make sure you take a look at the 'Bugs, limitations and compatibility issues' section in the Help file.
